topics.body:

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee2d5563687275476f1400#post_54ee2d5563687275476f1400
I think I saw my Sister's Husband watching this a Netflex?

He loves Marvel! (He is a giant Nerd and I love him so much!) and he especially loves the Hulk!
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee2da163687209cc7c0900#post_54ee2da163687209cc7c0900
I was watching it on Netflix. It's pretty good. It's a fun, carefree show with some really good voice work and animation. And Hulk is the fucking greatest in it. I never once thought I could describe an enormous green rage monster as "adorable" but there he is, BEING A-GODDAMN-DORABLE.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
